articles.title: Asia-Pacific shares mixed; most casino stocks in Hong Kong continue to slide amid regulatory fears - CNBC
articles.description: Hong Kong-listed casino stocks mostly continued declining in Thursday trade following heavy losses seen Wednesday.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE Shares in Asia-Pacific were mixed in Thursday morning trade, with casino shares in Hong Kong mostly seeing another day of losses.
